name.en: Independent study: The application of neuroimaging methods in psycholinguistics
name.ch: 獨立研究：腦造影工具在心理語言學的應用

department.ch: 認知神經科學研究所碩士班

goal.ch:
本課程的目標包括：
1. 促進學生對採用神經造影方法所進行之神經語言學研究的取向和成果之瞭解。
2. 培養學生進行實徵神經語言學研究、對結果進行分析、及以口頭和書面形式呈現結果的能力。
goal.en:
The goals of this course include:
1. Improve students’ understanding of neuroimaging research approaches and findings of neurolinguistics.
2. Develop students' abilities to conduct empirical neurolinguistic research, to analyze the results, and to summarize and to present the findings in both oral and written formats.

outline.ch: 本課程將介紹及討論和腦造影工具在心理語言學之應用此一主題相關的當代重要學術文章
outline.en: We will introduce and discuss the most updated articles regarding the applications of neuroimaging tools in psycholinguistics.

textbook.ch: 選自心理語言學與認知神經科學期刊之當代重要學術文章
textbook.en: Selected current articles from journals of psycholinguistics and cognitive neuroscience
